sentences.en: Agreed. I want to strangle Skip 2 mypoo.
sentences.cn: 同意.我恨不得掐死街球王.

sentences.en: Bree: Are you insane? Your thug tried to strangle him.
sentences.cn: 布雷: 你疯了? 你的暴徒试图扼杀他.

sentences.en: He give a strangle cry and fall to the floor.
sentences.cn: 他发出一声受扼的叫喊,随即倒在地板上.

sentences.en: He tried to strangle a border policeman and steal his gun.
sentences.cn: 他企图勒死一名边防警察并偷走他的枪。

sentences.en: He tried to strangle his opponent.
I could cheerfully strangle you for getting me into this mess!
sentences.cn: 你让我这样难堪,我恨不得掐死你!

sentences.en: I really want to strangle him.
I've seen snakes strangle people and swallow then whole!
sentences.cn: 我看到过蛇勒死并生吞某个人!

sentences.en: Mills argues that high taxation strangles the economy.
sentences.cn: 米尔斯认为高税收会阻碍经济的发展。

sentences.en: My lusts usurp the present tense And strangle Reason in his seat.
sentences.cn: 我的欲念掠取此刻并在他的座位上扼杀理性.

sentences.en: Parasitic vines that strangle the trees.
sentences.cn: 勒死这些大树的寄生爬藤.

sentences.en: Scarlett felt that she would strangle at the expression on Captain Butler's swarthy piratical face.
sentences.cn: 看着巴特勒船长那张海盗般黝黑的脸上的表情,思嘉只觉得自己快要给闷死了.

sentences.en: Suddenly my shirt collar felt like it was starting to strangle me.
sentences.cn: 突然我的衬衫领口感觉好像开始要扼死我.

sentences.en: Tariffs put a strangle hold on trade.
When I attended his lecture, I always tried hard to strangle yawns.
sentences.cn: 我上他的课时, 总是竭力地制止自己打呵欠.

trans.tran_en: To strangle someone means to kill them by squeezing their throat tightly so that they cannot breathe

trans.tran_cn: 扼死，勒死，绞死，使…窒息，抑制，压制
